about_the_game:
Enjoy the thrilling dark investigation "Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This additional content includes four new locations! You'll have to visit the section with the detectives, as well as explore Monique's room, where you're sure to find something that can clear things up! There's also a lot to discover in the old section and in Andreas' office!

In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and uncover secrets that will help you clear up the whole situation. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

📜 VISIT THE DETECTIVE SECTION!
Huge shelves with thick volumes of books dusted on them, various drawers, and... Mechanical librarian? Will you be able to find a necessary book among all these curiosities? Solve puzzles and find hidden objects in the detective section!

📜 TAKE A LOOK AROUND THE MONIKER ROOM!
You can make a psychological profile of a person by the room they live in. Can you do it? You can find so many entertaining things here that will definitely help shed some light on the situation.

📜 EXPLORE THE OLD SECTION!
Starry sky maps, telescopes and a table with different records. All of these can be seen in the old library section. You'll have to examine everything thoroughly to find even the slightest clue!

📜 EXPLORE ANDREAS'S STUDY!
Among the books, notes, an old chessboard and a forgotten coffee mug you might find something very interesting. It's up to you to pay a visit there and find out exactly what the place is hiding!

Are you ready to find all hidden objects and solve all the puzzles? Start your journey now and get all the achievements!
